casebody.data:
RAGLAND
v.
NASH-ROCKY MOUNT BOARD OF EDUCATION 251P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 22, 2016

Kimarlo A. Ragland, Pro se.

Ms. Deborah R. Stagner, Attorney at Law, For Nash-Rocky Mount Board Of Education

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of August 2016 by Petitioner for Addendum to Notice of Appeal and Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of September 2016. "
